Site.title: Promptopia
Site.description: A Next.js App Router Exercise by @Spas. Z. Spasov

Nav.searchPlaceholder: Search for a tag or username

Home.subHeading: Promptopia is an open-source AI prompting tool for modern word to discover, create and share creative prompts
Home.inputPlaceholder: Search for a tag or username

Form.postTypeDesc: { type } and share amazing prompts with the world, and let your imagination run wild with any AI-powered platform.
Form.linkDesc: Link to the AI platform you used to generate your prompt
Form.imageDesc: Upload an image generated by the AI platform where you used the prompt

Feed.searchForPlaceholder: Search for a prompt, tag or user

PostCard.linkAreaLabel: Link to the AI platform or source of the prompt

CreatePost.imageSizeError: Image size is too large. Maximum allowed size is 128KB.

DeletePost.title: Delete Post id:{ id }
DeletePost.description: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete this post?

Profile.description: Welcome to your profile page. Here you can see, edit or delete all your posts.
Profile.accountRemoveDisclaimer: If you need to remove your account, please contact us at { email } and we will do it for you.
